name: Video Interview with Windows 8.2 Concept Designer Jay Machalani
caption: www.wpcentral.com
description: Last week we reported on Jay s Windows 8.2 concept design. Many Windows fans around the world looked upon the concept animation and screenshots with awe, at a design that could not help to amaze. This week, we decided to have a virtual sit down with Jay and discuss his motivations for designing...

data.message: We are not used windows 8.1 yet and them will release 8.2 , Microsoft will going down now
